decks.notes: This deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays with a mix of powerful creatures and removal spells. It utilizes Golgari colors to take advantage of graveyard synergies and efficient creatures, aiming to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The key strategy is to establish board presence early with efficient threats like Mosswood Dreadknight and Glissa Sunslayer, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal spells like Go for the Throat. By maintaining pressure and control over the board, the deck aims to close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this Azorius Aggro deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building up a board presence quickly. Cards like Get Lost, Unsummon, and Recommission allow for tempo swings by removing threats or returning cards to hand. Founding the Third Path and Picklock Prankster provide card advantage and additional resources. Haughty Djinn and Abhorrent Oculus serve as aggressive creatures that can close out the game quickly. The deck also includes some control elements with Kiora, the Rising Tide and Meticulous Archive to maintain hand advantage and manipulate the board state.

The main concept of this Azorius Aggro deck revolves around establishing early board presence with low-cost creatures like Novice Inspector and Mockingbird, while using Leyline Axe and Zoetic Glyph to pump up their power. Spyglass Siren and Warden of the Inner Sky provide flying threats, while Floodpits Drowner can disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent quickly and efficiently, utilizing a mix of creatures and equipment to overwhelm them before they can establish their own game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game and disrupt your opponent's strategy while building up your own resources. Using a combination of counter spells, bounce effects, and draw spells, you aim to outlast your opponent and slowly gain an advantage. The deck utilizes a mix of creature removal, card draw, and mana ramp to stay ahead in the game. The key strategy is to keep the board clear and maintain card advantage until you can seize control and overwhelm your opponent with powerful threats.
